articles.title: Terranova Poster
articles.copy: Had a blast drawing this groovy poster for Terrnova's booth at the LA Art Book Fair - thery're the coolest publishers in Barcelona - the world, Check it out - BCN!!!

articles.title: CAN YOU DEAL?
articles.copy: Working on an awesome Zine with Jennifer Clavin of Bleached challenging sexism in the music industry through essays and art by amazing musicians. Smash the patriarchy - check out the promo: CAN YOU DEAL???!!!!!

articles.title: Zachary Leener Poster
articles.copy: Assisted artist Zachary Leener in the design of some stuffy style 80's upper west-side exhibition posters for his upcoming exhibit The Woronowii Editions at TIF SIGFRIDS!

articles.title: CHRIS CUNNINGHAM STUDIO
articles.copy: Very excited to provide Chris Cunningham Studio with development consulting on the initial launch of their new web presence. Get psyched on this teaser for the myriad projects this hyper influential director has been working on!

articles.title: n/naka
articles.copy: Proud and honored to have completed a refresh of the n/naka website. One of Los Angeles' truly special restaurants. If you're unfamiliar check out the Netflix documentary on head chef Niki Nakayama Chef's Table - Season 1 | Niki Nakayama.
